alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 3:50PM CDT until May 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. Minor coastal flooding is possible, and has been observed at some points along the US 90 Causeway road. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
